columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SCH_EXTRA_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores what special scheduler action, if any, was performed on scheduling.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Skip first occurence per off schedule occurrence


Extra Occurrence Scheduled at Start Point


Skip first occurrence per existing MAR time


First occurrence elapsed, extra occurrence scheduled at start point

columns.name: SCH_SKIPPED_DTTM
columns.description: The instant an occurrence was skipped by the scheduler because an off schedule occurrence was too close to a standard time.

columns.name: SCHEDULE_EXTRA_DTTM
columns.description: Time that an extra occurrence was scheduled since a standard specified time was just missed.
